original_text: And he brought us out from thence, that he might bring us in, to give us the land which he sware unto our fathers.
korean_text: 우리 조상들에게 맹세하신 땅을 우리에게 주어 들어가게 하시려고 우리를 거기서 인도하여 내시고

sentences.original_text: And he brought us out from thence
that he might bring us in
which he sware unto our fathers
